benefits.title: Why Choose Seedance 2.0 Text-to-Video
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Experience the most advanced text-to-video AI technology with native audio sync, physics simulation, and multi-shot narrative control.

items.title: Multi-Modal Prompt Support
items.description: Craft intricate scenes with comprehensive text prompts. Describe characters, settings, actions, lighting, camera movements, and even audio cues. Seedance 2.0 understands complex multi-element prompts with up to 12 reference inputs.

items.title: Multiple Visual Styles
items.description: Choose from photorealistic, anime, watercolor, cyberpunk, oil painting, 3D CG, and many more artistic styles. Seedance 2.0 renders each style with cinematic precision and consistent quality.

items.title: Physics-Aware Generation
items.description: Seedance 2.0's Spatial-Temporal Causal Modeling (STCM) ensures realistic motion ‚Äî gravity, inertia, cloth dynamics, and object interaction all behave according to real-world physics.

features.title: Seedance 2.0 Text-to-Video Core Features
features.description: Everything you need to create professional AI-generated videos from text prompts.

use_cases.title: Use Cases for Seedance 2.0 Text-to-Video

use_cases.description: Discover the endless possibilities of AI text-to-video generation with Seedance 2.0.

items.title: Social Media Content
items.description: Create engaging TikTok, Reels, and YouTube Shorts from simple text descriptions. Generate eye-catching videos in minutes with Seedance 2.0.

items.title: Short Film & Storytelling
items.description: Bring your stories to life with multi-shot AI narratives. Seedance 2.0 maintains character consistency across scenes for cohesive storytelling.

items.title: Education & Tutorials
items.description: Create educational videos and visual explanations. Seedance 2.0 generates step-by-step demonstrations with narration and sound effects.

items.title: Advertising & Marketing
items.description: Generate product showcases, promotional videos, and advertising content quickly. Professional-grade output for marketing campaigns.

faq.title: Seedance 2.0 Text-to-Video ‚Äî FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about Seedance 2.0 text-to-video generation.

items.question: What is Text-to-Video?
items.answer: Text-to-Video is an AI technology that converts written text descriptions into dynamic video content. With Seedance 2.0, you describe the scene, characters, actions, and style ‚Äî the AI generates a cinematic video with native audio, physics-based motion, and up to 2K resolution.

items.question: What visual styles are supported?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 supports multiple visual styles including photorealistic, anime, watercolor, cyberpunk, oil painting, 3D CG animation, and more. You can specify your preferred style in the text prompt or use image references.

items.question: What video resolutions are available?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 supports up to 2K high-definition output. Multiple aspect ratios are available including 16:9, 9:16, 1:1, 4:3, and 3:4 to fit any platform.

items.question: How long can generated videos be?
items.answer: Generated videos range from 4 to 15 seconds with precision down to 1-second increments. A 15-second video typically generates in about 60 seconds. Multi-shot storytelling allows you to create longer narratives by connecting multiple clips.

items.question: How detailed should my text prompts be?
items.answer: The more detailed your prompts, the better the results. Include descriptions of characters, settings, actions, lighting, camera angles, and artistic style. However, even simple prompts can produce impressive results thanks to Seedance 2.0's AI directing capabilities.

items.question: Can Seedance 2.0 generate video with sound?
items.answer: Yes! Seedance 2.0 features native audio-visual sync. The dual-branch diffusion transformer generates dialogue, sound effects, and music in parallel with visuals ‚Äî so audio is inherently synced, not dubbed.

cta.title: Start Creating Videos from Text with Seedance 2.0
cta.description: Transform your ideas into stunning cinematic videos with Seedance 2.0's AI-powered text-to-video generation. Try free today.
